Articles.Content: So I wanted to discuss how water works how it reacts and how to exploit it. So my thoughts are that water will probably be soon abused for its now characteristics. Discuss below how we can do that.
Because it is bouncy, you likely can throw Kerbals at it, or really high impact tolerance parts, at a very high speed and see how fast it goes...
subs. you can make subs! and large ones too take a look at the  Pompeii Class Submarine
